entries.name: Age
entries: Half-dwarves mature at the same rate as humans, but they're considered young until they reach the age of 30. On average, they live about 150 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: The storms of Vallakyr necessitate a pragmatic people, as a result Vallakyns have no alignment tendencies.

entries.name: Size
entries: Half-Dwarves stand between 4 and a half and 6 feet tall and average about 180 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your speed is not reduced by wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your dwarven blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Tool Proficiency
entries: You gain proficiency with the artisan's tools of your choice: {@item Smith's tools|phb}, {@item brewer's supplies|phb}, or {@item mason's tools|phb}.

entries.name: Skill Proficiency
entries: You gain proficiency with one skill of your choice.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Vallakyn, and either High or Low Common.

entries.name: Lightning Anger
entries: When in a hostile situation, Vallakyns can lose control of their temper, due to the influence of Aula. In confrontational situations where you are being targeted by a specific creature, make a wisdom saving throw (DC12). On a failed save you cast {@spell Witch Bolt} at first level at the target of your anger. This counts as a suprise round for initiative.

entries.name: Thunderous Laughter
entries: After a confrontation Vallakyns are quick to make friends. You have advantage on {@skill Persuasion} checks involving those you have previously been in combat with that day.
